mapper.select: SELECT a.asset_serial_number, a.asset_name, a.location, a.device_serial_number, d.device_name, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM asset a LEFT JOIN device d ON d.serial_number = a.device_serial_number
SELECT a.asset_serial_number, a.asset_name, a.location, a.device_serial_number, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM asset a WHERE a.asset_serial_number = #{assetSerialNumber}
SELECT asset_serial_number FROM asset WHERE device_serial_number = #{deviceSerialNumber}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO asset ( asset_serial_number, asset_name, location, device_serial_number, start_date, end_date ) VALUES ( #{assetSerialNumber}, #{assetName}, #{location}, #{deviceSerialNumber}, #{startDate}, #{endDate} );
mapper.update: UPDATE asset SET asset_name = #{assetName}, location = #{location}, device_serial_number = #{deviceSerialNumber}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate} WHERE asset_serial_number = #{assetSerialNumber}
